meanings.definition: The act, process, or industry of extracting ores, coal, etc., from mines.
meanings.sent1: The minings in the area have provided jobs for many people.
meanings.sent2: The minings in this region contribute significantly to the economy.
meanings.sent3: The minings in the hills seem to be never-ending!
meanings.sent4: The minings of precious metals are like uncovering hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The minings deep underground are full of mystery and adventure.

meanings.sent1: We visited the abandoned minings to learn about their history.
meanings.sent2: The minings are now protected as historical landmarks.
meanings.sent3: Exploring the old minings felt like stepping back in time.
meanings.sent4: The minings stand as a testament to the hard work of miners in the past.
meanings.sent5: The minings hold stories of sweat and perseverance within their walls.

meanings.definition: The process or business of digging in mines for minerals.
meanings.sent1: The minings require skilled workers to extract valuable minerals.
meanings.sent2: Companies invest in modern equipment for efficient minings.
meanings.sent3: The minings operation was temporarily halted due to safety concerns.
meanings.sent4: Successful minings demand careful planning and execution.
meanings.sent5: The minings industry plays a crucial role in resource extraction.
